text: Carlos Padilla is a Filipino politician from Dupax del Norte, Nueva Vizcaya, Philippines. He is currently serving his second term as the Governor of Nueva Vizcaya. Padilla was elected to his first term as Governor in 2016 and was re- elected in 2019. ==References== ==External links== *Province of Nueva Vizcaya Official Website Category:Living people Category:Governors of Nueva Vizcaya Category:1944 births Category:Nacionalista Party politicians Category:Polytechnic University of the Philippines alumni
title: Carlos Padilla (politician)
